At the launch of the E30 range in 1982  the 316 used a 1766 cc version of the M10 fed by a carburetor and producing 66 kW (89 hp).[31][39] The 318i had the same M10 engine  but with Bosch L-Jetronic fuel-injection  increasing power to 77 kW (103 hp)[31][40] while also improving fuel economy.https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BMW_3_Series_(E30)#Four-cylinder_petrol
